description: Try our easy to follow Pear, Kiwifruit & Lime Juice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear, Kiwifruit & Lime Juice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the kiwifruit. Slice the kiwifruit, pears and lime into even-sized pieces then juice.
Pour into a tall glass, add a couple of ice cubes, if using, decorate with slices of kiwifruit, if liked, and serve immediately.
